basics.name: Aisylu Shakirova
basics.label: Frontend developer
basics.summary: I'm an experienced frontend developer. I have a passion for accuracy and style and I try to incorporate it into my job.

work.summary: Developing web systems, SPA and landing pages from zero to launch for such companies as Wellmedia, Polyter, Hausmaster, Opochta
highlights: My main area of expertise is Frontend development, main skills are JavaScript, Vue/Vuex, Html, CSS, Bootstrap.
Frontend development using JavaScript and Vue.js
Backend development using Python framework Flask and SQLAlchemy, JavaScript-based CMS
Working with SEO tools and integration of SEO parameters into websites

work.summary: Axiros - the German based technology leader in device management, TR-069, and IoT solutions for service providers, enterprises, and OEMs.
highlights: Developing and testing scripts for auto-configuration servers (ACS) using Python
Developing configuration for customer-premises equipment (CPE) and integrating these devices with the company's system 'Support Portal Axiros' using the TR-069 protocol
Creating microlibrary on Python for automation of CPE configuration process
Writing custom scripts within the scope of integration tasks of the company's system 'Support Portal Axiros' with CPE.

work.position: Freelancer and student of courses  “Coding in Java programming language”

highlights: Website development, mainly landing pages and multi-page websites using CMS 1C-Bitrix (analogue of WordPress or Magenta)
Developing responsive and cross-browser layouts using JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, Uikit, Less, Gulp
Customization of current CMS components for the realization client needs

education.institution: Kazan Power Engineering University, Kazan, Russia
PhD, Kazan Power Engineering University, Kazan, Russia
